A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The trailer made me excited and made it look epic..it was all a lie. From the very beginning of the film it plays out like an SNL skit of itself..any hints of that Star Wars \"feeling\" and connection are instantly ruined with cheap unwelcome attempts at humor.  What he did to Luke's character was infuriating and insulting. No wonder Mark Hamill said he hates it..all the scenes without Luke\, Rey and Kylo were so boring and pointless I just didnt even care. so disappointing..
